turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter. I'm a new patient.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help you with that. Let me check Dr. Carter's availability for new patients. Can you please provide your full name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's John Smith, and my birthday is 03/15/1988. Ugh, this is always such a hassle!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Smith. One moment while I access the scheduling system. Dr. Carter has openings on Tuesday the 27th at 9:00 AM and Thursday the 29th at 2:30 PM. Would either of those times work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, those are both tough. What's the typical length of a new patient appointment? I need to figure out if I can swing it with work.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: New patient appointments with Dr. Carter usually last about 60-90 minutes, Mr. Smith. It is best to allow for 90 minutes just in case. The time is needed to gather detailed medical history.
